mapper.select: SELECT user_id, nick_name, user_sex, user_role, user_exprience, user_email, user_birthday, user_head_photo, user_desc, user_status from user where (user_name=#{userName} or user_email=#{userName}) and pass_word=#{passWord}

select u.user_id, sum(a.look_num) as user_look_num, count(distinct a.article_id) as blog_num, count(att.attention_id) as funs_num, count(uc.user_comment_id) as comment_num from user as u left join article as a on u.user_id=a.user_id and a.article_status=0 left join attention as att on u.user_id=att.attented_user_id left join user_comment as uc on a.article_id=uc.article_id where u.user_id=#{userId} ;
